name: bowling nightmare
description:
this is made for fun, a bowling alley has been added even though it was made in 1 night

this was made using (mostly) only the godot templates

have fun! (use alt+f4 to close)

P R O T O T Y P E

enjoy

press alt+F4 to close

this message is shown in-game press p to dismiss it in-game
